title: Author Registration
description: Secure your spot at IC-SIT 2026 by registering as an author. Our registration process is secure and hassle-free, ensuring a smooth experience for you.
highlights: Early Bird registration fee are Rs 8,000 for categories 1, 2, and 3 from India
Articles from early bird registrants are eligible to receive an invitation to submit to Scopus-indexed journals.
Best Paper Award will be presented for each track to recognize outstanding contributions!

instructions.title: Instructions for Registration
list: At least one author for each accepted paper must register under category 1, 2 or 3.
An author can present a maximum of two papers. However, each paper needs to be registered separately.
At least one author must present their accepted paper in the conference for consideration of publication on IEEE Xplore. The presenter must be a registered author for the conference.
The author presenting the paper will only receive the presentation certificate.
Registration fee includes publication fee, registration kit, conference lunch.
Registration fee is inclusive of all applicable taxes.
Student registrants will be required to submit their institute ID proof to avail the discount on registration fee.

notes.title: Important Notes
list: Registration category should be chosen appropriately from the aforementioned table.
Early Bird Registration closes on Jul 15, 2026
Payment gateway charges along with applicable taxes or levies, if any, will have to be borne by the registrant.
Registration fee is non-refundable and non-transferable.
Please keep a copy of the generated transaction ID by the payment gateway as well as by your bank. These may be required, if you need to track your payment/registration later.
Please note, IC-SIT 2026 organizing committee will not be responsible for any financial loss caused by improper transactions during registration process for IC-SIT 2026.
Participation certificates will be provided to registered attendees.
